modName: Glitch and Consistency Fixes for Skyrim

descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60308-2-1417064808.png[/img][/center][/size][color=#ffff00][size=5]Do you want to contribute to this mod. well read on. I need help from the player community to help me find some consistency errors in the game (Like backwards chests and stuff like that) If you want to report a consistency error in the game go to the Consistency Error Reporter topic under the Forums Tab and comment on it telling me the location where you encountered the consistency error (E.G. Proudspire manor chest by the bed) I would prefer you guys to use the below format  to report the consistency errors (Mainly so its easy for me to find and fix)

[Error reporting format]
Error Type: Brief description of what it is (EX: backwards Chest)
Error Location: Location of the error (EX: Proudspire Manor)
Error Cell Location: (EX: Interior or Exterior)
Error is Near: just give a brief description (or picture (Which would be preferred)) of whats around it, so its easier for me to find.


[color=red]*Remember to endorse if you like the mod*[/color][/size][/color]
[size=5]
[Contents]
1. Description
2. Installation
3. Un-Installation
4. Current Versions
5. Change Log
6. Current Glitch fixes
7. Current Consistency fixes

1. [Description]
This mod is gonna be a series of glitch fixes (If their easy enough for me to fix) and consistency fixes (like backwards chests) that Bethesda never has fixed. Currently theres only one glitch fix and its a major pain in the rear glitch. The Giants club glitch where he does that one move and you go flying 50000 miles in the air this is fixed by reducing the force applied on that exact move by quite a lot (From 3000 force to 150) which in turn fixes the glitch.

[color=yellow]*Please track the mod as I will add separate files one for glitches and he other for Consistency fixes named “Skyrim Glitch Fixes (version number) and Skyrim Consistency fixes (version number).*[/color]

2. [Installation]
Use Nexus Mod Manager

3. [Un-Installation]
Use Nexus Mod Manager
4. [Current Version]
1.0
5. [Change Log]
[Skyrim Glitch Fixes]
[Version 1.0]
-Initial Release
-Giants club glitch fix
[Skyrim Consistency Fixes]
[Version 1.0]
-Initial Release
-Consistancy Fix (Proudspire Manor Chest)
-Consistancy Fix (Dead Crone Rock Chest)
6. [Current Glitch fixes]
-Giants Club Glitch fix
7. [Current Consistency fixes]
-Consistancy Fix (Proudspire Manor Chest)
-Consistancy Fix (Dead Crone Rock Chest)
[/size]
author: DarkWolfModding
